data.comment: The match has started.
Reims are caught offside.
In the minute 1, Reims awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Reims get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nimes's half?
Free kick for Nimes in their own half.
In the minute 3, Jeremy Stinat signals a Nimes throw-in in Reims's half.
In Reims Reims drive forward through Valon Berisha. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Throw-in Nimes.
In the minute 5, Nimes to take a throw-in in Reims territory.
Throw-in for Reims in the half of Nimes.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 7, Throw-in for Nimes in their own half.
Reims have been awarded a corner by Jeremy Stinat.
Jeremy Stinat awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 11, Jeremy Stinat signals a Nimes throw-in in Reims's half.
Goal kick for Reims at Stade Auguste Delaune.
Throw-in for Nimes at Stade Auguste Delaune.
In the minute 13, Valon Berisha gets his shot on target but fails to score for Reims.
Throw-in for Reims in the half of Nimes.
In Reims a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 15, It's a goal kick for the home team in Reims.
Free kick for Reims in the half of Nimes.
Nimes have a goal kick.
In the minute 17, Corner awarded to Reims.
Reims are coming forward and Valon Berisha gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Nimes goal kick.
In the minute 17, Nimes awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Jeremy Stinat signals a free kick to Reims.
Jeremy Stinat signals a free kick to Nimes in their own half.
Reims awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 19, Kaj Sierhuis for Reims has been booked by Jeremy Stinat and receives a first yellow card.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 22, Reims to take a throw-in in Nimes territory.
Nathanael Mbuku for Reims drives towards goal at Stade Auguste Delaune. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Can Nimes get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Reims's half?
In the minute 25, Nimes to take a throw-in in Reims territory.
Ball safe as Reims is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Nimes at Stade Auguste Delaune.
In the minute 25, Free kick for Nimes in their own half.
Jeremy Stinat signals a throw-in for Reims, close to Nimes's area.
Jeremy Stinat signals a free kick to Nimes in their own half.
In the minute 29, Ball safe as Nimes is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Nimes needs to be cautious. Reims have an attacking throw-in.
Reims's Boulaye Dia gets in a shot on goal at Stade Auguste Delaune. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 32, Free kick Nimes.
Reims's Boulaye Dia is whistled for offside at Stade Auguste Delaune.
Free kick for Reims in their own half.
In the minute 34, At Stade Auguste Delaune, Renaud Ripart has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In Reims a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Jeremy Stinat awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 37, Jeremy Stinat signals a free kick to Nimes in their own half.
Free kick Reims.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 40, Reims have a goal kick.
Nimes awarded a throw-in in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Reims.
In the minute 41, Can Nimes get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Reims's half?
Throw-in for Nimes in the half of Reims.
Free kick in a good position for Reims!
In the minute 45, Reims's Mathieu Cafaro gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Jeremy Stinat awards Nimes a goal kick.
Jeremy Stinat signals a free kick to Nimes.
In the minute 45, The first-half has ended.
The second-half has started.
Nimes awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 46, Reims's Marshall Munetsi has been booked in Reims.
Jeremy Stinat signals a Reims throw-in in Nimes's half.
Nimes push upfield but Jeremy Stinat quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 49, Throw-in for Nimes in their own half.
Throw-in Nimes.
Reims pushes forward through Mathieu Cafaro, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 53, Reims have been awarded a corner by Jeremy Stinat.
Jeremy Stinat awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Nimes in their own half.
Throw-in Reims.
In the minute 55, Nimes make their first substitution with Kevin Denkey replacing Moussa Kone.
Free kick for Nimes in the half of Reims.
In the minute 56, Nimes's Renaud Ripart misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Reims at Stade Auguste Delaune.
Throw-in for Reims close to the penalty box.
In the minute 57, Jeremy Stinat signals a free kick to Nimes in their own half.
The home team replace Kaj Sierhuis with Moussa Doumbia.
El Bilal Toure is replacing Nathanael Mbuku for the home team.
In the minute 59, Throw-in for Reims in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
An attacking Nimes player has been brought down in the area ... It's a penalty!
In the minute 62, Renaud Ripart converts the penalty to give Nimes a 0-1 lead.
El Bilal Toure gets his shot on target but fails to score for Reims.
Ball goes out of play for a Nimes goal kick.
In the minute 66, Corner awarded to Nimes.
Reims awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Nimes awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 67, Ghislain Konan is replacing Thibault De Smet for Reims at Stade Auguste Delaune.
Jeremy Stinat signals a free kick to Nimes in their own half.
Ball safe as Reims is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 69, Can Reims get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nimes's half?
In Reims a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Important block from the Nimes defence as Moussa Doumbia fires in a strike for Reims.
In the minute 70, Reims have been awarded a corner by Jeremy Stinat.
Free kick for Nimes in their own half.
Throw-in for Nimes in the half of Reims.
In the minute 72, Jeremy Stinat signals a Nimes throw-in in Reims's half.
Nimes drives forward and Kevin Denkey gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Nimes to take a throw-in in Reims territory.
In the minute 73, Marshall Munetsi (Reims) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Mathieu Cafaro for Reims gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Nimes goal kick.
In the minute 75, Corner awarded to Reims.
Jeremy Stinat signals a free kick to Reims just outside Nimes's area.
Reims are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In the minute 77, Throw-in for Nimes at Stade Auguste Delaune.
Reims awarded a throw-in in their own half.
David Guion (Reims) is making a fourth substitution, with Arber Zeneli replacing Mathieu Cafaro.
In the minute 79, Jeremy Stinat awards the away team a throw-in.
Can Reims get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nimes's half?
In the minute 80, Jeremy Stinat signals a Reims throw-in in Nimes's half.
Karim Aribi is on a sub for Kevin Denkey for Nimes.
Free kick for Nimes in the half of Reims.
Throw-in for Reims in their own half.
In the minute 82, Nimes awarded a free kick in their own half.
Valon Berisha (Reims) has received a yellow card from Jeremy Stinat.
Ball safe as Reims is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 84, Reims drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Throw-in for Nimes at Stade Auguste Delaune.
Jeremy Stinat signals a free kick to Reims.
In the minute 87, Free kick for Nimes in their own half.
Throw-in Reims.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Reims have been awarded a corner by Jeremy Stinat.
Jeremy Stinat will wait an extra 4 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Valon Berisha (Reims) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
El Bilal Toure (Reims) gets in a great strike â€“ straight into the post! Ohhhh so close!
Corner awarded to Reims.
It's 0-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
